� github.com/thien1212381
Phuoc Thien Lam
I love data, want to work with a highly scalable system and big data, I have 2+ years of experience building a system
with Golang, Nodejs language, deploying services, building a data pipeline. I am looking for working at creative and
more challenging environments.
Summary Summary    
02/2017 - now
08/2016 - 12/2016
08/2016 - 02/2017
Backend & System Leader
Skylab Technology Cooperation
+ REST API and CMS website with Golang, Nodejs, Python
    - Store and Manage user information system
    - Trip Social network system: friends, followers, plans, and trips.
    - Book Social Network System: user, books (users want to share and find)
    - Food Social Network System: user, sharing food images with location
+ Building Real-time tracking location system with Nodejs and MongoDB
+ Building Real-time chat system with Nodejs, SocketIO, and MongoDB
+ Pushing notification with Firebase, APNS-P8
+ Working with the Search engine: Sphinx, Solr
+ Researching Elliptic curve cryptography, Ethereum, and Bitcoin core to generate ETH, BTC wallets from random,
build encrypt end-to-end system (Elliptic curve Diffie Hellman)
+ Building Microservices with Golang (use gRPC - Protobuf) to store transactions, and store tokens of addresses in
Ethereum Network
+ Building notification system for new transaction of subscribed address in ETH, BTC, LTC, DOGE Network.
+ Working the message queue: Kafka, NATS, Redis
+ Deploying services in Amazon Cloud Services (EC2) and Google Cloud Platform  with docker and docker-compose
+ Building the CI/CD system for automatically deploying Golang services, and building Android - IOS Applications with
Jenkins
+ Building Recommendation books system from friends. (base on user-user and user-book)
+ Crawling book information from Tiki.
+ Crawling food images from Instagram, Google.
+ Crawling food location from Foody.
+ Database: Postgres, Mysql, Mongodb
+ Recognizing food images (CNN model with Keras framework)
Data Engineer
Grokking Data Engineer Course
+ Building Data Pipeline to Data warehouse for an e-commerce startup. (using Kafka, Hadoop, Spark). Data from two
sources: one is from real-time event data, two is from the production database (Postgres)
+ Visualizing data for business analyst from Data warehouse (Reports)
+ Building Real-time monitoring dashboard: active users, trending video ... (using Nodejs, SocketIO, and Redis)
Junior Machine Learning Engineer
Work experience
Work experience

Goodia Viet Nam
+ Social Listening from pages in Instagram
+ Analyst user influence by calculating the score of some keywords in social. (base on Tf-IDF).
